How to remove Dr.Web for Android with installed anti-theft
Before removing the Dr.Web anti-virus, go to Administration. Under Security, clear the Dr.Web Anti-virus option.

Whats New:
Added a new component - Firewall that protects the mobile device from unauthorized external access and prevents leaks of important data via network. The Firewall helps to control Internet connections and Internet data transfer as well as block suspicious connections.
Added detection of applications that exploit the vulnerability relating to the filename length.
Improved Security Auditor.

[b]This app has NO advertisements[/b]

[b]Requires Android - varies with device [/b]

[b]Installation Notes :-[/b]

*Unzip the downloaded torrent file

*Copy and paste the apk file into sd_card of your android mobile

* Install it in your mobile.

How to insert key:

1. Place key to folder: /sdcard/Android/data/com.drweb/files/
2. Install dr web. Open it.
3. Select "Use existing license"
4. Select "Copy from file" > OK
5. It shows "The key file is received" > OK
6. Done. The key file valid until 20/05/2016

[b]For more info :https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.drweb.pro.market[/b]
